From: 
Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2019 2:51 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: FW: Prince Andrew as Epstein witness? - HuffPost 
From: Sara Boboltz 
Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2019 2:49 PM 
To:   
Subject: Prince Andrew as Epstein witness? - HuffPost 
Hello, 
Writing to ask whether Britain's Prince Andrew will submit to questioning by U.S. investigators looking into 
Jeffrey Epstein's potential co-conspirators. The Telegraph reported this morning that the prince is preparing to do 
so. 
Please let me know one way or the other if you can confirm. Thank you. 
Sara Boboltz 
Reporter HuffPost 
New York, NY 10003 
sara_bee 
EFTA00016000
